publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1219 Cathy Jamieson: Reducing Reoffending - Improving the Effectiveness of Custodial and Non-Custodial Sentences-That the Parliament notes the publication of Reduce, Rehabilitate, Reform - A Consultation on Reducing Reoffending in Scotland and recognises the need for significant improvement and change in the management of offenders serving custodial and non-custodial sentences in order to reduce reoffending and step up the efficiency and effectiveness of the criminal justice system. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
